document.full_text: robert gates on friday became the first u.s. defense secretary to visit the west bank, meeting palestinian leaders keenly aware of every little nod to their hopes of achieving statehood.
document.title: gates first u.s. defense chief to visit palestinians
lines_and_colors: robert gates on friday became the first u.s. defense secretary to visit the west bank, meeting palestinian leaders keenly aware of every little nod to their hopes of achieving statehood.
